data.name: Furry Shades of Gay 3: Still Gayer
data.detailed_description:
Furry Shades of Gay 3: Still Gayer continues the epic saga of furry men loving other furry men with new stories, new characters and other new things!




The sex will get even hotter with new, much longer and more varied animations. All the thrusts and tugs and jerks and stretches are more expressive now and our animators are having an absolute blast with them. And for the first time in the series all the animations will have voice acting and sound effects!



The puzzle engine is getting another upgrade as well. New goals, new obstacles, and new themed levels await you! Plow through all the targets and you’ll get to see your favourite characters plow each other!



Don’t forget to add the game to your wishlist and click the follow button so you won’t miss out on exciting news and exclusive previews!

Features

  • Five all new, even gayer stories
  • More than 60 fully original artworks
  • Longer animated sex scenes with sound and voiceovers
  • Branching narrative, hard choices, sloppy rewards
  • Updated Match-3 gameplay with new goals and features

data.short_description: Furry Shades of Gay 3 gets even steamier and funnier with new stories, new characters and new features! Go through all the branches and see new, longer animations with more varied poses, and for the first time in the series, voice acting!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB+
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: There's gay sex and male nudity in this one.
